14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited eating the cat and from its price." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib. We do not know of any major (known) narrators who reports from 'Umar bin Zaid (one of the narrators) besides 'Abdur-Razzaq

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ ثَمَنِ الْكَلْبِ وَالسِّنَّوْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Price Of A Dog And A Cat
